channel.title: Defender for Cloud on Cloud architect insights :: Joshua Mangold

item.title: Mastering Azure Security with Microsoft Defender for Cloud- Improve Your Secure Posture
item.description: Mastering Azure Security with Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Improve Your Secure Posture In this comprehensive article, we’ll explore how you can leverage the powerful features of Microsoft Defender for Cloud to enhance the security posture of your Azure environment. By the end of this post, you’ll have a deep understanding of how to use vulnerability assessment for virtual machines and containers, automate recommendation workflows, and access your secure score data using Azure Resource Graph (ARG).
